user_proxy_agent.content:
Execute the USER TESTING TASK INSTRUCTIONS: "Feature: Complex E-commerce Product Search and Cart Management ;next; Scenario:Search for a product, add to cart, and verify cart contentsSearch for a product, add to cart, and verify cart contents ;next;  Given I am on the "https://www.saucedemo.com" website ;next;  When I enter "standard_user" in the username field ;next;  And I enter "secret_sauce" in the password field ;next;  And I click the "Login" button ;next;  Then I should see the inventory page ;next;  When I click the "Add to cart" button for the first item ;next;  Then I should see the cart badge with "1" items ;next;  When I click on the cart icon ;next;  Then I should see the cart page ;next;  And I should see the first item in my cart ;next;  When I click the "Remove" button for the item ;next;  Then I should see the cart badge with "0" items ;next;  And I should see an empty cart with no items"

user_proxy_agent.name: user

content.plan:
1. Navigate to 'https://www.saucedemo.com'.
2. Enter 'standard_user' in the username field.
3. Enter 'secret_sauce' in the password field.
4. Click the 'Login' button.
5. Verify that the inventory page is displayed.
6. Click the 'Add to cart' button for the first item.
7. Verify that the cart badge shows '1' item.
8. Click on the cart icon.
9. Verify that the cart page is displayed.
10. Verify that the first item is in the cart.
11. Click the 'Remove' button for the item.
12. Verify that the cart badge shows '0' items.
13. Verify that the cart is empty with no items.
